Post-Match Reflections: Chauncey Billups said the Blazers were reasonably disappointed they didnâ€™t go 4-1 on the trip
Billups thought the team played well and had a good trip
Billups said learning to become more efficient in close games is part of being a young team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blazers' defensive rating dropped to 113.6 during the trip, a mission accomplished by Chauncey Billups
The Blazers shot 39.6% from beyond the arc during the trip, third in the NBA during that stretch
Portland's true-shooting percentage jumped from 55.2% during the season to 59.4% during the trip
The Blazers rank 28th in defensive rebounding percentage and 28th in turnover percentage for the season
Others: Anfernee Simons averaged 25.2 points with 6.2 assists while shooting 51.6% from the field and 48% from three-point range during the trip
Deni Avdija averaged 17.4 points with 8.4 rebounds and 3.4 assists while shooting 51.5% from the field during the trip
Shaedon Sharpe averaged 19.6 points and 5.2 rebounds with 3.4 assists while shooting 46.3% from the field and 40.6% from three-point range during the trip
